trans-unit.source:
No charges were reported to your Miles and More account ending in %bold_on%%login%%bold_off% for the month of %date%. This could be because of a known bug in the reporting where charges during a calendar month are not reported properly or because you made no charges that month. M&M rules require you to make a charge every month. Missing even one month means your miles are at risk of expiring starting 36 months from when they were earned. If you believe you did make a charge during %date% you should contact M&M to have them examine your account.

You also may want to go to the M&M forum on Flyertalk for more information about this issue and options if you failed to make the required monthly charge of at least $1 or had credits to your account in excess of your charges.
trans-unit.target:
No se ha informado de ning√∫n cargo en tu cuenta "Miles and More" que acaba en %bold_on%%login%%bold_off% en el mes de %date%. Esto se puede deber a un error al informar de tus cargos en un mes espec√≠fico, o por lo contrario, puede que no tengas ning√∫n cargo ese mes. Seg√∫n las normas de M&M, debes hacer un cargo cada mes. Si pierdes un mes, eso significar√° que tus millas ganadas en los 36 meses anteriores pueden caducar. Si crees que no has hecho ning√∫n cargo en %date% debes ponerte en contacto con M&M para que examinen m√°s detalladamente tu cuenta.

Tambi√©n puedes visitar el foro de M&M en Flyertalk para obtener m√°s informaci√≥n sobre esto y para saber qu√© opciones tienes en caso de que no hayas realizado un cargo correspondiente de al menos 1 USD en dicho mes, o en caso de que los cr√©ditos de tu cuenta superen tus cargos.

trans-unit.source: Recently we noticed that someone tried to log in to your AwardWallet profile with your password and we have reasons to believe that it was not you. To prevent them from being able to login we sent a one-time code to your email address which prevented them from actually gaining access to your account. However, we believe that your AwardWallet password was compromised, so we reset your password to a random value. To login to your AwardWallet account please reset your password via this link:

Para iniciar sesi√≥n en tu cuenta de AwardWallet, restablece tu contrase√±a a trav√©s de este enlace:

trans-unit.source: We don't know how your AwardWallet password was compromised but we suspect that you used this password on some other websites or online services and at least one of those services was hacked. One way to check if your account was hacked is via this website: %link%. Also please note that AwardWallet was not hacked and due to our additional security (us sending a one-time code to you in case of suspicious login activity) your account was not compromised. Finally, for added security we recommend all of our users to %2f_link%set up two-factor authentication%link_off% on AwardWallet, also, you can read more about our security practices here:
trans-unit.target: No sabemos c√≥mo ha sido afectada tu contrase√±a de AwardWallet pero sospechamos que ha podido ser porque has usado esta misma contrase√±a en otras p√°ginas web o servicios en l√≠nea y que por lo menos uno de esos servicios ha sido hackeado. Una de las formas de saber si tu cuenta ha sido hackeada es a trav√©s de esta p√°gina web: %link%. Ten en cuenta tambi√©n que AwardWallet no ha sido hackeada y que debido a nuestras medidas de seguridad extra (como enviarte un c√≥digo √∫nico en caso de cualquier sospecha de inicio de sesi√≥n ajena), tu cuenta no se ha visto afectada.
